Pre-Game Insights: Mbappé sustained a broken nose and didn't play in the previous matches, but he might return for the France vs. Poland match.
France needs a point to guarantee a place in the round of 16 but probably has done enough already to advance.
Poland lost its opening two games and was the first team to be eliminated from the tournament.
Poland captain Robert Lewandowski, who turns 36 in August, could be playing his last-ever European Championship match.
Wojciech Szczęsny will be replaced as goalkeeper for Poland in the final group match.
